name: Checkout Mestres do WP for WooCommerce
author: Mestres do WP

sections.description:
*Pro | Documentation | Discord *

Explore a variety of tools designed to enhance your customer’s shopping journey.

üëâ Simplified Direct Checkout

Simplify the checkout process, enabling your customers to complete their purchases in just a few clicks. More convenience, fewer steps!

üëâ One-Page Checkout and Layouts

Mix all the functionalities of the cart and checkout into a single page. Your customers can adjust quantities and remove products directly on this page, resulting in a smoother checkout experience with fewer interruptions.

üëâ Streamlined Checkout Enhancement

Provide an improved checkout experience with a smoother and more linear process. Less friction leads to higher conversion rates and more loyal customers.

üëâ Checkout Split into Stages

Boost user satisfaction and conversions by dividing the checkout process into simpler and clearer stages.

üëâ Constant Compatibility and Support

Developed with WooCommerce’s standard models, ensuring compatibility with most themes. If you find any issues, our support is ready to assist in the dedicated forum.

üëâ Quick Simplification

Simplify and optimize the checkout process for your customers within minutes! Forget the complexity of building pages and funnels. The templates are ready for immediate use. Attract more customers, achieve more sales! üöÄ‚ú®

PRO

  • Customizable one-page checkout
  • Automatic address for residents in Brazil
  • Seamless integration with Google Tag Manager
  • Recovery of abandoned carts via email and WhatsApp
  • Recovery of pending payments via email and WhatsApp
  • Shipping simulator on the product page
  • Installment simulator on the product page
  • Discounts for payment methods
  • Personalized login and registration pages
  • Custom transactional emails and messages via WhatsApp
  • Automated delivery of tracking codes via email and WhatsApp messages
  • Integration with Correios, Melhor Envio, Frenet, Mandabem, Kangu
  • Personalized thank you pages
  • Additional offer during checkout (Order bump)

*Pro | Documentation | Discord *
sections.installation:
Automatic installation through WordPress

  1. Select Add New in your WordPress on the Plugins tab.
  2. Look for Checkout Mestres WP.
  3. Click on Install Now and Activate Plugin.

For manual installation via FTP:

  1. Upload the checkout-mestres-wp to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Activate it in the Plugins section of your WordPress.

short_description: Transform the Shopping Experience with Ease and Efficiency on your WooCommerce Site
description:
*Pro | Documentation | Discord *

Explore a variety of tools designed to enhance your customer’s shopping journey.

üëâ Simplified Direct Checkout

Simplify the checkout process, enabling your customers to complete their purchases in just a few clicks. More convenience, fewer steps!

üëâ One-Page Checkout and Layouts

Mix all the functionalities of the cart and checkout into a single page. Your customers can adjust quantities and remove products directly on this page, resulting in a smoother checkout experience with fewer interruptions.

üëâ Streamlined Checkout Enhancement

Provide an improved checkout experience with a smoother and more linear process. Less friction leads to higher conversion rates and more loyal customers.

üëâ Checkout Split into Stages

Boost user satisfaction and conversions by dividing the checkout process into simpler and clearer stages.

üëâ Constant Compatibility and Support

Developed with WooCommerce’s standard models, ensuring compatibility with most themes. If you find any issues, our support is ready to assist in the dedicated forum.

üëâ Quick Simplification

Simplify and optimize the checkout process for your customers within minutes! Forget the complexity of building pages and funnels. The templates are ready for immediate use. Attract more customers, achieve more sales! üöÄ‚ú®

PRO

  • Customizable one-page checkout
  • Automatic address for residents in Brazil
  • Seamless integration with Google Tag Manager
  • Recovery of abandoned carts via email and WhatsApp
  • Recovery of pending payments via email and WhatsApp
  • Shipping simulator on the product page
  • Installment simulator on the product page
  • Discounts for payment methods
  • Personalized login and registration pages
  • Custom transactional emails and messages via WhatsApp
  • Automated delivery of tracking codes via email and WhatsApp messages
  • Integration with Correios, Melhor Envio, Frenet, Mandabem, Kangu
  • Personalized thank you pages
  • Additional offer during checkout (Order bump)

*Pro | Documentation | Discord *
